name: homelab-gitops-auditor
description: Homelab GitOps Auditor with Enhanced Dashboard & Pipeline Integration

scripts.dev:api:phase2: cd api && NODE_ENV=development PHASE=2 npm run dev
scripts.dev:dashboard:phase2: cd dashboard && VITE_PHASE=2 npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:dashboard
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:dashboard
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:dashboard
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:api && npm run install:dashboard
